description.text: This +1 longsword sheds light as a torch and when drawn emits a shining starburst around the hilt, similar to Iomedae's holy symbol. Any cure spells or lay on hands effects used to heal the wielder of this blade heal an additional 1 point of damage per die, up to the effect's normal maximum healing amount. Once per day, the wielder can use inheritor's smite.
